docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman API v2 is currently the default API version.

methods.name: index

apis.short_description: List of override values for a specific smart variable
List of override values for a specific smart class parameter

params.name: smart_variable_id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

params.name: smart_class_parameter_id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.
